entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:47 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: S 29 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early this evening then changing to 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
